thread.title: Pia Guanio confirms rumours of second pregnancy
thread.title_full: Pia Guanio confirms rumours of second pregnancy

title: Pia Guanio confirms rumours of second pregnancy
text: Share 21 Feb - Actress and TV personality Pia Guanio has confirmed rumours of a second pregnancy. According to PEP News, the 43-year-old, who joked about her pregnancy on "Eat Bulaga!" back in January, announced the good news on Instagram with a photo of the baby's ultrasound. She first thanked her husband for his Valentine's Day gift - a painting by Maxine Syjuco, before adding, "...and for this other gift! Thank you Lord, for being so gracious to us!" Guanio and husband Steve Mago already have a five-year-old daughter named Scarlet Jenine. (Photo Source: Pia Guanio Instagram)
